column3:
Eshana needs help with a pair of troublesome griffins.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
We have a requessst from the griffin handlers. Giff tells me that a young pair of griffin sssiblings butted heads during training, and then flew off in a flurry of talons and feathers.
These cloudkin are prideful creatures─easily aggravated and difficult to tame─but you ssseem to have a way with them.
If you're willing to help, they were lassst ssseen heading north. The smaller griffin veered ssslightly to the wessst after a final ssswipe from his bigger brother, who banked away to the eassst.
Once you've rallied the younger's ssspirits and sssoothed the older's agitation, I'm certain they'll find their way back to the ssstables on their own.
The griffin responds to your soothing tone, becoming visibly calmer!
The griffin eyes you with obvious distrust...
The griffin appears agitated and unhappy. Use the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>soothe<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> emote to calm the creature.
The griffin's mood seems improved by your encouragement!
The griffin seems hesitant and wary...

The small griffin appears to be sulking after losing to his older brother. Use the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>rally<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> emote to lift his spirits.

Thank you, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>─the griffin sssiblings are back in their ssstables, sssafe and sssound. They show great promissse, but the lively temperament for which they are admired is a double-edged sssword for those who ssstruggle to tame them.
And yet you handled them with relative ease! You have a talent for reaching the heartsss of both man and beassst─the trainers will be mossst enviousss to hear of your effortless sssuccess.
